Package com.example.mini_pekkas

Class OrganizerEventsListViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.mini_pekkas.OrganizerEventsListViewModel
public class OrganizerEventsListViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
Shared ViewModel for the Organizer actions. Handles retrieving, updating, adding, and deleting events for Organizers.

      public void setSelectedEvent(Event event)
      Adds a new event to the event list.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be added to the list.

    • getEventList

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<ArrayList<Event>> getEventList()
      Retrieves events created by the organizer from the database and adds them to the EventList.

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event)
      Ensures that event data is only loaded once by checking if data has already been initialized. If not, it calls getEventsFromDb() to retrieve event data.

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventId)
      Deletes an event from the event list based on the event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to be deleted.

    • updateEventInDb

      public void updateEventInDb(Event event)

      public void initializeDataIfNeeded()
      this function ensures that the events are only loaded once

    • getEventsFromDb

      public void getEventsFromDb()
      Retrieves events created by the user from db and adds them to the EventList.
